name: MechWarrior 2: 31st Century Combat
description:
MechWarrior 2: 31st Century Combat is a simulation game developed by Activision. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Activision Blizzard. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play MechWarrior 2: 31st Century Combat on PlayStation, Classic Macintosh, SEGA Saturn and PC.
Josh Resnick produced the game. It was directed by John Spinale. It was scored by Gregory Alper and Jeehun Hwang.
